PRIVACY_POLICY_INTRO: RentExpres the company is committed to protecting the privacy of individuals who use our vehicle rental platform. This Privacy Policy describes what personal data we collect, for what purposes, how long we keep it, with whom we share it, and what rights you have under Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and applicable data protection law.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S1_TEXT: The data controller for your personal data is RentExpress. For any matter related to this policy or to the exercise of your rights, you may contact us using the contact details provided at the end of this document.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_INTRO: We may collect and process the following categories of personal data:
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_IDENTITY: Identification data: name, surname(s), identity document or equivalent, date of birth, when necessary for the contract or by law.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_CONTACT: Contact data: email address, phone number, and postal address.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_ACCOUNT: Account data: username, password (stored securely and not in readable form), and account preferences.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_RESERVATIONS: Reservation and billing data: rental dates, pickup and return location, vehicle reserved, amounts, payment method, and data required for invoicing.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_USAGE: Usage data: history of use of the website or application, searches and reservations made, to improve the service and user experience.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S2_TECHNICAL: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device, and log data when you access our services, for security and legal compliance.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S3_INTRO: We process your personal data on the following legal bases and for the purposes stated:
PRIVACY_POLICY_S3_CONTRACT: Performance of contract: account management, reservations, rentals, and billing.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S3_LEGAL: Legal obligation: retention of accounting and tax records and compliance with sector-specific regulations.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S3_LEGITIMATE: Legitimate interest: improving the platform, security, fraud prevention, and communications regarding your reservation or account.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S3_CONSENT: Consent: sending commercial or marketing communications when you have agreed; you may withdraw consent at any time.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S4_TEXT: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary for the purposes described and to comply with legal obligations. In general: account and reservation data are kept while you have a contractual relationship with us and, after it ends, for the applicable limitation and legal retention periods (typically several years under tax and commercial law). Technical and access data are retained as long as needed for security and incident resolution. After these periods, data are deleted or anonymised.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S5_TEXT: Your data may be disclosed to: providers who perform necessary services for us (hosting, payment gateways, email delivery, technical support), who act as processors under contractual confidentiality and security obligations; public authorities when required by law. We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties for commercial purposes.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S6_TEXT: If any of our providers or services involve transfers of data to countries outside the European Economic Area, we ensure that appropriate safeguards (standard contractual clauses, adequacy decisions or other approved mechanisms) are in place so that the level of protection is equivalent to that required in the EU.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_INTRO: You may exercise the following rights at any time, within the limits set by law:
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_ACCESS: Access: obtain confirmation as to whether we process your data and a copy of such data.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_RECTIFICATION: Rectification: request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_ERASURE: Erasure (¬´right to be forgotten¬ª): request deletion of your data where the law allows.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_RESTRICTION: Restriction of processing: request that we only retain your data without using it for other purposes in the cases provided by law.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_PORTABILITY: Data portability: receive your data in a structured, commonly used format where processing is based on consent or contract performance.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_OBJECTION: Objection: object to processing based on legitimate interest, including direct marketing.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_WITHDRAW: Withdrawal of consent: where processing is based on your consent, you may withdraw it at any time without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_COMPLAINT: Complaint to a supervisory authority: you have the right to lodge a complaint with a competent data protection authority (e.g. the Spanish Data Protection Agency, AEPD) if you consider that the processing infringes applicable law.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S7_HOW: To exercise these rights, contact us by email or the contact form indicated at the end of this policy. We will respond within the legal timeframe (usually one month, extendable by two months if necessary).
PRIVACY_POLICY_S8_TEXT: We use cookies and similar technologies for the proper functioning of the site, user session, security and, where you consent, for analytics and preferences. You can set your browser to reject or limit cookies; in that case, some site features may not be available. Further details can be found in our cookie policy or in the consent banner on our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S9_TEXT: We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures (access control, encryption, audits, staff training) to protect your data against unauthorised access, loss, destruction or alteration. In the event of a security breach that may affect your data, we will inform you and, where required, the supervisory authority in accordance with the law.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S10_TEXT: Our services are intended for adults or persons with the legal capacity to enter into contracts. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you become aware that we have received data from a minor without parental or equivalent consent, please contact us so that we can delete it.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S11_TEXT: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or in the law. Material changes will be communicated by a notice on the website or by email where required by law. We recommend that you review this page periodically. The ¬´Last updated¬ª date indicates the current version.
PRIVACY_POLICY_S12_TEXT: For any questions about this policy, to exercise your rights or to report issues related to your personal data, you may contact us at: soporte@rentexpress.com. If we appoint a Data Protection Officer (DPO), their contact details will be published in this section or in a visible link on the website.

CLEAR_PRICES_DESC: No hidden fees on every booking.

HOME_REVIEWS_SUBTITLE: Real stories from people who booked with RentExpress.
HOME_REVIEW_1_TEXT: The process was fast and the car was spotless.
HOME_REVIEW_2_TEXT: Easy booking from the phone and no surprises.
HOME_REVIEW_3_TEXT: I found better rates than on other sites.
HOME_REVIEW_4_TEXT: Clear attention and support throughout the trip.
HOME_ADVANTAGES_TITLE: We compare car rental prices, you save money
HOME_ADVANTAGES_SUBTITLE: More transparency, more options, and better support.
HOME_ADVANTAGE_FIND_TITLE: Find the perfect car for your trip
HOME_ADVANTAGE_FIND_TEXT: RentExpress gathers offers from different providers so you can choose the ideal car for each destination. Everything with clear rates and no hidden costs.
HOME_ADVANTAGE_LOW_TEXT: We negotiate rates with multiple rental companies to ensure the most competitive prices. That way you can save without sacrificing quality.
HOME_TRUST_TEXT: Customer feedback helps us continually improve the service and maintain quality standards.
HOME_TIPS_TITLE: How to find a great car rental deal
HOME_TIPS_SUBTITLE: Recommendations to get the lowest fare.
HOME_TIP_1_TEXT: Secure better prices by booking before your trip date.
HOME_TIP_2_TEXT: Check ratings and experiences from other users.
HOME_TIP_3_TEXT: Check the deposit amount before you travel.
HOME_TIP_4_TEXT: Avoid extra charges by checking mileage and fuel policies.
HOME_REQUIREMENTS_TITLE: What do you need to pick up the car?
HOME_REQUIREMENT_1_TEXT: Valid license in the main driver‚Äôs name.
HOME_REQUIREMENT_3_TEXT: In the main driver‚Äôs name for the deposit.
HOME_REQUIREMENT_4_TEXT: Printed or electronic voucher if available.
HOME_FAQ_SUBTITLE: We answer the most common questions before your trip.
HOME_FAQ_1_QUESTION: What do I need to rent a car?
HOME_FAQ_1_ANSWER: You need a valid driver‚Äôs license, a credit card, and an ID document.
HOME_FAQ_2_QUESTION: At what age can I rent a car?
HOME_FAQ_2_ANSWER: It depends on the country and company, but usually from age 21.
HOME_FAQ_3_QUESTION: Is it possible to rent without a credit card?
HOME_FAQ_3_ANSWER: Some companies allow debit cards, but you should verify before booking.
HOME_FAQ_4_QUESTION: What should I consider when choosing a company?
HOME_FAQ_4_ANSWER: Compare ratings, fuel policies, and insurance conditions.

TERMS_INTRO: By using RentExpress you agree to the following terms and conditions for the vehicle rental service.
TERMS_S1_TEXT: The service is intended for users with legal capacity to contract. You agree to provide accurate data and to use the platform lawfully.
TERMS_S2_TEXT: Bookings are subject to availability and the cancellation policy stated for each offer. Prices may or may not include taxes as per applicable regulations.
TERMS_S3_TEXT: The user must meet the age, documentation and driving licence requirements for each location. Non-compliance may result in cancellation of the rental.
TERMS_S4_TEXT: For enquiries about these terms you may contact us on the contact page or at soporte@rentexpress.com.
CONTACT_SUBTITLE: Have questions or need help? Write or call us.
CONTACT_SUCCESS: Message sent. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
STATS_ERROR: Could not load statistics. Please try again.
REC_SUBTITLE: Answer 4 questions and we'll suggest the ideal vehicle
REC_Q1_LABEL: What type of destination are you heading to?
REC_Q4_LABEL: What will the road conditions be like?
REC_ERROR_GENERIC: We couldn't generate a recommendation. Try again later.
PICKUP_VERIFICATION_SUBTITLE: Enter the customer's pickup code to verify their reservation.
PICKUP_CODE_INVALID: Invalid code or no pending reservation found.
PICKUP_CONFIRMED: Pickup confirmed. The rental has been created successfully.
PICKUP_CONFIRM_ERROR: Error confirming pickup. Please try again.
PICKUP_CODE_GENERATED: Pickup code generated and sent to the customer.
COMPLETE_RETURN_DESCRIPTION: Register the vehicle return and enter the final mileage.
LATE_FEE_NOTICE: The vehicle was returned late. A surcharge will be applied.
GRACE_PERIOD_INFO: A 59-minute grace period applies. After that, 1.5x the daily rate is charged per extra day.
